velops and grows
25
the brain is developing. The 
heart begins to beat and can be 
seen beating on an ultrasound 
scan. Dimples on the side of 
the head will become the ears  
and there are thickenings where 
the eyes will be. On the body, 
bumps are forming that will 
become muscles and bones. 
Small swellings (called ‘limb 
buds’) show where the arms 
and legs are growing. At seven 
weeks, the embryo has grown 
to about 10mm long from head 
to bottom. This measurement is 
called	the	‘crown–rum
